checkUrl: Please check the URL and try again
successDesc: Your payment has been processed successfully.
rewardDesc: You may have earned FOODY token rewards with this payment. Connect your wallet to claim them!
connectWalletPrompt: Connect your wallet to pay with FOODY tokens
nfcInfo: NFC tags let customers tap their phone on the table to open the payment page instantly.
nfcCompat: Works with all smartphones. QR codes are generated as backup.
nfcHold: Hold NFC tag near your device...
nfcPermissionDenied: NFC permission denied. Please allow NFC access.
nfcNotSupported: NFC not supported on this device.
nfcAvailable: Web NFC is available on this device!
nfcInstructions: Click the NFC button on each tag, then hold a blank NFC sticker near your phone to program it.
nfcNotAvailableDesc: Web NFC requires Chrome on Android. Use a dedicated NFC writer app (like NFC Tools) to write the URLs above to your NFC tags. QR codes work as a universal alternative.
noReaders: No readers found. Make sure your reader is powered on and nearby.
terminalLoadError: Failed to load Terminal SDK. Please refresh.
stripeRequiredDesc: Please complete Stripe onboarding in your dashboard before using POS.
